This app demonstrates:

1. All available parameters of navset_pill_list:
   - id
   - selected
   - header
   - footer
   - well
   - widths

2. Key features:
   - Responsive navigation layout
   - Card-based content organization
   - Dynamic content based on selection
   - Reactive updates
   - Styled presentation

3. Technical aspects:
   - Uses express mode syntax
   - Demonstrates nested layouts
   - Shows reactive rendering
   - Includes proper UI organization

4. The app shows:
   - A header explaining the demo
   - A pill navigation list on the left
   - Content area on the right
   - Selection tracking
   - Statistics about the current selection

To run this app, simply save it as a .py file and run it with `shiny run app.py`. The app will demonstrate a professional-looking navigation interface with all the features of navset_pill_list.

The app uses made-up population data for demonstration purposes and doesn't rely on any external files. All data is contained within the app itself.
